tool_description: An API showing all the latest climate change news arround the world
name: Climate Chamge Live
title: Climate Chamge Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Climate Change from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-chamge-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-chamge-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-chamge-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-chamge-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All climate change news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change from all over the world
